definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Sa 18:9 mule;—´[[פ]] abs. 2Sa 18:9, 2Sa 18:9, 2Sa 18:9 +, sf. [[פִּרְדּוֹ]] 2Sa 13:29; pl. [[פְּרָדִים]] 1Ki 10:25 +; [[פִּרְדֵיהֶם]] Ezr 2:66 = Ne 7:68 (van d. H.; Gi Baer in marg.);—mule, ridden by princes 2Sa 13:29, in battle 2Sa 18:9, 2Sa 18:9, 2Sa 18:9; cf. (later, + horses, etc.) Zec 14:15, Is 66:20; royal gift 1Ki 10:25 = 2Ch 9:24; royal property 1Ki 18:5; in trade of Tyre Ez Eze 27:14; beast of burden, [[מַשָּׂא]] [[חֶמֶד פְּרָדִים]] 2Ki 5:17 the load of a pair of mules, of earth, 1Ch 12:40; property of returning exiles Ezr 2:66 = Ne 7:68; as refractory Ps 32:9 (in sim.).
